description:
Trees subject to tree preservation order - LBI TPO (NO.301) 2006:
T1 - Sycamore x 1 (301/T1) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches  
T2 - Plane x 1 (301/T2) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches 
T3 - Plane x 1 (301/T3) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches 
T4 - Lime x 1 (301/T4) - Reduce as before  
T5 & T6 - Plane x 2 (301/T5 & T6) - Re-pollard 
T7 - Plane x 1 (301/T7) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches
T8 - Plane x 1 (301/T8) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches
T9 - Lime x 1 - (301/T9) - Prune to clear adjacent tree and telephone lines. Prune off epicormic growth. Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches 
T10 - Cherry x 1 (301/T10) - Lift to achieve 2.5m clearance of footpath 
T11 - Birch x 1 (301/T11) - Lift to clear pathway by 3m

Tree subject to tree preservation order - LBI TPO (NO.302) 2006:
T13 - False acacia x 1 (302/T12) - Crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches
